short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block your browser. Get things done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Web Until is a dead simple tool for blocking all web pages until a date and time that you choose. This extension is a great tool for writers, artists, designers, and developers who need to work on the computer without the temptation of internet.
